definitions.definition: Any substance , especially food , used in catching fish , or other animals, by alluring them to a hook , snare , trap , or net .
Food containing poison or a harmful additive to kill animals that are pests.
Anything which allures ; something or someone used to lure or entice someone or something into doing something

subdefinitions.definition: Something that lures or entices a specified group
labels: as the head of a compound
subdefinitions.label_groups: as the head of a compound

definitions.definition: A portion of food or drink, as a refreshment taken on a journey; also, a stop for rest and refreshment.

subdefinitions.definition: A packed lunch - the bite to eat a worker took with them to eat
A small meal taken mid-morning while farming.

definitions.definition: A post intended to elicit a, usually strong or negative, reaction from others.
examples: Please stop posting bait , or I will have to mute you.

main_definition: Any substance , especially food , used in catching fish , or other animals, by alluring them to a hook , snare , trap , or net .
secondary_definitions: Food containing poison or a harmful additive to kill animals that are pests.
Anything which allures ; something or someone used to lure or entice someone or something into doing something
A portion of food or drink, as a refreshment taken on a journey; also, a stop for rest and refreshment.
( Internet slang ) A post intended to elicit a, usually strong or negative, reaction from others.
